attributes.additional_details: I have been wanting a dog for ages, since I got one when I was 8 and it died I got one more named max, my parents sent him away because he was too much work. That was when I was young , but I would help care for a new dog now. I have a dog called buddy but he is very old and seems to be lonely. All I need is 100 people or more  to sign and that will really help me to get one. Thank you to anyone that signs
attributes.background: I'm just a 14 year old girl who really wants a dog because I'm lonely as I live in the countryside
